General.Name: Serabi Gold PLC
General.Description: Serabi Gold plc engages in the evaluation, exploration, and development of gold and other metals mining projects in Brazil. The company explores for and produces gold and copper deposits. It primarily holds 100% interests in the Palito mining complex covering an area of approximately 56,631 hectares; and the Coringa Gold Project located in the Tapajos region of northern Brazil. The company was formerly known as Serabi Mining Limited and changed its name to Serabi Gold plc in October 2011. Serabi Gold plc was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Cobham, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 30-32 Ludgate Hill, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7DR
